movies.title: Fight Club(1999)
movies.summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: American Beauty(1999)
movies.summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.title: Det sjunde inseglet(1957)
movies.summary: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

movies.title: The Lost Weekend(1945)
movies.summary: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

movies.title: Some Like It Hot(1959)
movies.summary: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

movies.title: The Apartment(1960)
movies.summary: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

movies.title: Irma la Douce(1963)
movies.summary: In Paris, a former policeman falls in love with a prostitute, and tries to get her out of that life by paying for all of her time.

movies.title: Sabrina(1954)
movies.summary: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

movies.title: Stalag 17(1953)
movies.summary: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

movies.title: Ace in the Hole(1951)
movies.summary: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to re-jump start his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

movies.title: Double Indemnity(1944)
movies.summary: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

movies.title: Sunset Blvd.(1950)
movies.summary: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

movies.title: Love in the Afternoon(1957)
movies.summary: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

movies.title: The Fortune Cookie(1966)
movies.summary: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

movies.title: Rear Window(1954)
movies.summary: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

movies.title: North by Northwest(1959)
movies.summary: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

movies.title: Psycho(1960)
movies.summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles forty thousand dollars from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movies.title: Hitchcock and Dial M(2004)
movies.summary: A retrospective look at the brilliance of Alfred Hitchcock's Dial M for Murder.

movies.title: Vertigo(1958)
movies.summary: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

movies.title: Buddy Buddy(1981)
movies.summary: During a high profile Mafia testimony case in California's Riverside County, a hired killer checks-in a hotel room near the courthouse while his next door depressed neighbor wants to commit suicide due to marital problems.

movies.title: Witness for the Prosecution(1957)
movies.summary: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

movies.title: Troy(2004)
movies.summary: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds(2009)
movies.summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Se7en(1995)
movies.summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: Snatch(2000)
movies.summary: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.title: Thelma & Louise(1991)
movies.summary: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

movies.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button(2008)
movies.summary: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.

movies.title: Meet Joe Black(1998)
movies.summary: Death, who takes the form of a young man (Brad Pitt), asks a media mogul (Sir Anthony Hopkins) to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter (Claire Forlani).

movies.title: World War Z(2013)
movies.summary: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.

movies.title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles(1994)
movies.summary: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

movies.title: Ocean's Eleven(2001)
movies.summary: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

movies.title: Moneyball(2011)
movies.summary: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

movies.title: Twelve Monkeys(1995)
movies.summary: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

movies.title: Allied(2016)
movies.summary: In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.

movies.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford(2007)
movies.summary: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

movies.title: 12 Years a Slave(2013)
movies.summary: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

movies.title: Titanic(1997)
movies.summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street(2013)
movies.summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: The Revenant(2015)
movies.summary: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.title: Inception(2010)
movies.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Catch Me If You Can(2002)
movies.summary: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully forged millions of dollars' worth of checks while posing as a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.

movies.title: Django Unchained(2012)
movies.summary: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption(1994)
movies.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather(1972)
movies.summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight(2008)
movies.summary: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham. The Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II(1974)
movies.summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King(2003)
movies.summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction(1994)
movies.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Schindler's List(1993)
movies.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men(1957)
movies.summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring(2001)
movies.summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Forrest Gump(1994)
movies.summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo(1966)
movies.summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.title: Seppuku(1962)
movies.summary: An elder ronin samurai arrives at a feudal lord's home and requests an honorable place to commit suicide. But when the ronin inquires about a younger samurai who arrived before him things take an unexpected turn.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers(2002)
movies.summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: The Matrix(1999)
movies.summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Goodfellas(1990)
movies.summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back(1980)
movies.summary: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest(1975)
movies.summary: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame(2019)
movies.summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Interstellar(2014)
movies.summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Cidade de Deus(2002)
movies.summary: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

movies.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi(2001)
movies.summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: The Green Mile(1999)
movies.summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: La vita è bella(1997)
movies.summary: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

movies.title: Léon(1994)
movies.summary: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs(1991)
movies.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: Star Wars(1977)
movies.summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.title: Shichinin no samurai(1954)
movies.summary: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life(1946)
movies.summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies.title: Capharnaüm(2018)
movies.summary: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War(2018)
movies.summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: Whiplash(2014)
movies.summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: The Intouchables(2011)
movies.summary: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.title: The Prestige(2006)
movies.summary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: The Departed(2006)
movies.summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: The Pianist(2002)
movies.summary: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: Gladiator(2000)
movies.summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: American History X(1998)
movies.summary: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects(1995)
movies.summary: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.title: The Lion King(1994)
movies.summary: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day(1991)
movies.summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies.title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso(1988)
movies.summary: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

movies.title: Back to the Future(1985)
movies.summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in the West(1968)
movies.summary: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

movies.title: Casablanca(1942)
movies.summary: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.

movies.title: The Great Dictator(1940)
movies.summary: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

movies.title: Modern Times(1936)
movies.summary: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.title: City Lights(1931)
movies.summary: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

movies.title: Kimi no na wa.(2016)
movies.summary: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse(2018)
movies.summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.title: Coco(2017)
movies.summary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises(2012)
movies.summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.title: 3 Idiots(2009)
movies.summary: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

movies.title: Taare Zameen Par(2007)
movies.summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

movies.title: WALL·E(2008)
movies.summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.title: Oldeuboi(2003)
movies.summary: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies.title: Memento(2000)
movies.summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America(1984)
movies.summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark(1981)
movies.summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

movies.title: The Shining(1980)
movies.summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now(1979)
movies.summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: Romeo + Juliet(1996)
movies.summary: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

movies.title: Orphan(2009)
movies.summary: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9 year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she claims to be.

movies.title: Critters 3(1991)
movies.summary: The tiny fur ball aliens that will eat anything or anyone set their sights on a Los Angeles apartment tower.

movies.title: Out of the Furnace(2013)
movies.summary: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

movies.title: This Boy's Life(1993)
movies.summary: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 1950s teenager and his abusive stepfather, based on the memoirs of writer and literature Professor Tobias Wolff.

movies.title: Body of Lies(2008)
movies.summary: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

movies.title: Before the Flood(2016)
movies.summary: A look at how climate change affects our environment and what society can do to prevent the demise of endangered species, ecosystems and native communities across the planet.

movies.title: The Aviator(2004)
movies.summary: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

movies.title: Total Eclipse(1995)
movies.summary: Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.

movies.title: J. Edgar(2011)
movies.summary: J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly 50 years, looks back on his professional and personal life.

movies.title: Runner Runner(2013)
movies.summary: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

movies.title: The Great Gatsby(2013)
movies.summary: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

movies.title: Revolutionary Road(2008)
movies.summary: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

movies.title: Red Riding Hood(2011)
movies.summary: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

movies.title: Shutter Island(2010)
movies.summary: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer, who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: Gangs of New York(2002)
movies.summary: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

movies.title: Marvin's Room(1996)
movies.summary: After 20 years caring for her father, woman with cancer now must re-connect with her trashy sister and nephews she's never met after being diagnosed. Her love helps the angry teen nephew, and her sister learns to relate to people.

movies.title: Live by Night(2016)
movies.summary: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan.

movies.title: Robin Hood(2018)
movies.summary: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.

movies.title: The Beach(2000)
movies.summary: Vicenarian Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss. Excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

movies.title: The Basketball Diaries(1995)
movies.summary: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

movies.title: Poison Ivy(1992)
movies.summary: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

movies.title: The Quick and the Dead(1995)
movies.summary: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

movies.title: Ford v Ferrari(2019)
movies.summary: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference, the laws of physics and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary race car for Ford and challenge Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

movies.title: American Psycho(2000)
movies.summary: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

movies.title: Equilibrium(2002)
movies.summary: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

movies.title: Vice(2018)
movies.summary: The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.

movies.title: Empire of the Sun(1987)
movies.summary: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation during World War II.

movies.title: The Fighter(2010)
movies.summary: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

movies.title: The Big Short(2015)
movies.summary: In 2006-7 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

movies.title: The Machinist(2004)
movies.summary: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

movies.title: Hostiles(2017)
movies.summary: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

movies.title: American Hustle(2013)
movies.summary: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the Mafia.

movies.title: Batman Begins(2005)
movies.summary: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies.title: About Time(2013)
movies.summary: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

movies.title: No Strings Attached(2011)
movies.summary: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

movies.title: Black Swan(2010)
movies.summary: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".

movies.title: Annihilation(2018)
movies.summary: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

movies.title: Friends with Benefits(2011)
movies.summary: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

movies.title: The Legend of Tarzan(2016)
movies.summary: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

movies.title: Focus(2015)
movies.summary: In the midst of veteran con man Nicky's latest scheme, a woman from his past - now an accomplished femme fatale - shows up and throws his plans for a loop.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace(1999)
movies.summary: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

movies.title: I, Tonya(2017)
movies.summary: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

movies.title: Closer(2004)
movies.summary: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

movies.title: Terminal(2018)
movies.summary: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

movies.title: Suicide Squad(2016)
movies.summary: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

movies.title: V for Vendetta(2005)
movies.summary: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World(2013)
movies.summary: When Dr. Jane Foster (Natalie Portman) gets cursed with a powerful entity known as the Aether, Thor is heralded of the cosmic event known as the Convergence and the genocidal Dark Elves.

movies.title: Mary Queen of Scots(2018)
movies.summary: Mary Stuart's attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I, Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

movies.title: Thor(2011)
movies.summary: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
